name: analytics_data_realtime_get
description: Returns real time data for a view (profile).

ids.description: Unique table ID for retrieving real time data. Table ID is of the form ga:XXXX, where XXXX is the Analytics view (profile) ID.

metrics.description: A comma-separated list of real time metrics. E.g., 'rt:activeUsers'. At least one metric must be specified.

dimensions.description: A comma-separated list of real time dimensions. E.g., 'rt:medium,rt:city'.

filters.description: A comma-separated list of dimension or metric filters to be applied to real time data.

max-results.description: The maximum number of entries to include in this feed.

sort.description: A comma-separated list of dimensions or metrics that determine the sort order for real time data.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: An opaque string that represents a user for quota purposes. Must not exceed 40 characters.

$block: Real time data for a given view (profile).

$ul: **columnHeaders**: Column headers that list dimension names followed by the metric names. The order of dimensions and metrics is same as specified in the request.
**id**: Unique ID for this data response.
**kind**: Resource type. (default: analytics#realtimeData)
**profileInfo**: Information for the view (profile), for which the real time data was requested.
**accountId**: Account ID to which this view (profile) belongs.
**internalWebPropertyId**: Internal ID for the web property to which this view (profile) belongs.
**profileId**: View (Profile) ID.
**profileName**: View (Profile) name.
**tableId**: Table ID for view (profile).
**webPropertyId**: Web Property ID to which this view (profile) belongs.
**query**: Real time data request query parameters.
**dimensions**: List of real time dimensions.
**filters**: Comma-separated list of dimension or metric filters.
**ids**: Unique table ID.
**max-results**: Maximum results per page.
**metrics**: List of real time metrics.
**sort**: List of dimensions or metrics based on which real time data is sorted.
**rows**: Real time data rows, where each row contains a list of dimension values followed by the metric values. The order of dimensions and metrics is same as specified in the request.
**selfLink**: Link to this page.
**totalResults**: The total number of rows for the query, regardless of the number of rows in the response.

**totalsForAllResults**: Total values for the requested metrics over all the results, not just the results returned in this response. The order of the metric totals is same as the metric order specified in the request.
